name: Into Black
storyline: In Into Black, players take on the role of a deep space scavenger stranded on an alien world, tasked with exploring its dark secrets, mining valuable resources, and battling hostile alien creatures to repair their ship and escape. Accompanied by a quirky robot companion, players will embark on a thrilling journey through a vast, mysterious world. The game features a fully voice-acted campaign, solo and co-op gameplay, and a competitive PvPvE mode.
summary:
A lone wanderer on the edge of space, a mystery as old as the universe itself, and one little robot who just wants to make the tea.
Into Black is a First-Person action adventure that takes you into the depths of a mysterious alien planet. Explore the endless darkness, mine valuable resources, and fight off alien beasts as you try to repair your ship and escape.
